thread.title: China a 'rogue state', says ex Cameron adviser Steve Hilton
thread.title_full: China a 'rogue state', says ex Cameron adviser Steve Hilton - BBC News

author: BBC
title: China a 'rogue state', says ex Cameron adviser Steve Hilton
text:
Media playback is unsupported on your device China a 'rogue state', says ex Cameron adviser Steve Hilton 21 October 2015 Last updated at 10:24 BST
Britain's efforts to "suck up" to China are a "national humiliation", David Cameron's former adviser Steve Hilton tells the BBC's Newsnight but advertising mogul Sir Martin Sorrell says the Chinese "listen" to human rights concerns.
